articles.title: Metis lawyer: Indigenous identity fraud harmful - CTV News
articles.description: Since Grey Owl a century ago, people of European descent have falsely claimed to be Indigenous for personal gain or a sense of absolution, but one Metis legal expert says it would take a psychiatrist to try to fully answer, 'why?' Lawyer Jean Teillet's report…
